title: Reading Experience Enhancements
description: Add reading progress indicator and social sharing buttons to improve user engagement

features.title: Reading Progress Indicator
features.description: Visual progress bar showing scroll depth through blog posts

stories.title: Build scroll progress tracker
stories.description: Create hook and component to track reading progress through article
acceptance_criteria: Progress bar fixed at top of viewport during scroll
Bar width represents percentage of article read (0-100%)
Smooth animation as user scrolls (requestAnimationFrame or CSS transform)
Only appears on blog post pages, not other pages
Hides when user scrolls up past article start
Respects prefers-reduced-motion for smooth scrolling
Performance optimized (no layout thrashing)
stories.technical_notes: Use IntersectionObserver to detect article bounds, useScroll from framer-motion or custom hook with addEventListener('scroll')

stories.title: Style progress bar with neo-brutalist design
stories.description: Apply brand styling to reading progress indicator
acceptance_criteria: Progress bar uses accent color with thick height (4-6px)
Hard edges, no rounded corners or gradients
High contrast against background
Visible but non-intrusive (doesn't block content)
Z-index ensures it appears above content but below modals
Optional: add percentage text for accessibility
stories.technical_notes: Fixed position, top: 0, transform: scaleX() for width animation

features.title: Social Sharing Buttons
features.description: Add share buttons for Twitter/X, LinkedIn, and native sharing

stories.title: Create ShareButtons component
stories.description: Build component with share buttons for social platforms
acceptance_criteria: Component shows share buttons for Twitter/X, LinkedIn, and native Web Share API
Twitter/X share includes post title and URL with handle @daksmitty
LinkedIn share includes post title, excerpt, and URL
Native share button uses navigator.share() when available (mobile/modern browsers)
Fallback to manual links when Web Share API unavailable
Copy link button with success feedback (checkmark or toast)
Buttons grouped in horizontal layout with consistent spacing
Each button has descriptive ARIA label
stories.technical_notes: Client component with feature detection for navigator.share, use share URLs: twitter.com/intent/tweet, linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite

stories.title: Integrate ShareButtons into blog post layout
stories.description: Add share buttons to blog post page in logical location
acceptance_criteria: Share buttons appear at end of post content (before comments)
Alternative: sticky floating share bar on desktop (left/right of content)
Neo-brutalist button styling with thick borders
Hover states with transform animation (respects reduced motion)
Mobile-friendly with appropriate touch target sizes (min 44x44px)
Positioned to not interfere with reading flow
stories.technical_notes: Add to app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx, consider position (inline vs sticky sidebar)

success_criteria: Reading progress bar appears smoothly on blog posts
Share buttons work on all major platforms and browsers
Native sharing works on mobile devices
notes: Reading progress and share buttons should enhance without disrupting reading experience
